bibl.title: Titles and Honorific Epithets in Nubian Greek Texts.
bibl.note: 1. Basileus / Basiliskos. - 2. Basileus, Phylarchos, Hypotyrannos. - 3. Eparchos, Exarchos, Nauarchos. - 4. Meizon, Meizoteros, Protomeizoteros; Domestikos. - 5. Ecclesiastical Titles and Their Pagan Counterparts. - Appendix: Inventory of Titles and Honorific Epithets, A.D. 300-1400.
